tag_list: online-marketing, search-marketing, local-search, seo, sem, strategic-partnerships
overview:
(Curtis) R. Curtis is a 17+ year veteran & recognized leader in the Internet, Ecommerce, Hosting and Online Marketing industries and speaks regularly at related conferences.

Since the early 90s, Curtis has been a leader in the evolution of the WWW, working first with the government on implementing what became the first ISPs and in 1993, the startup and management an ISP. After selling the company, he went on to work with online access providers and telecommunication companies such as AT&T, TELUS, Rogers, Sprint, Group Telecom and others.

Currently Curtis is the Sr. VP, Strategic Partnerships with UniversalBusinessListing.Org, which provides a unique listing service to help online businesses manage & distribute enhanced business listings and profiles to all the major US search engines, online Yellow Pages, 411 Directory Assistance and Mobile/GPS Navigation devices.

Curtis holds a Bachelors degree in Business Administration (U of A) and did Post Graduate work in Marketing and Business Law (U of C). He is married to his beautiful Bulgarian architect, Dafina and has 2 incredible sons, Stefan and LG.
